Module LeaveManagementModule
Package leave.manager

Class LeaveManager

java.lang.Object
leave.manager.LeaveManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
LeaveManagement
public class LeaveManager extends Object implements LeaveManagement
Manages leave-related operations. This class provides methods for approving, rejecting, and retrieving leave records, as well as managing leave balances. Utilizes interfaces LeaveDataService, and LeaveManagement for data access and management.

Available methods:

  • approveLeave(String)
  • rejectLeave(String, int, String, int)
  • getLeaveRecord(String)
  • getLeaveRecord_List(int)
  • getLeaveRecord_List()
  • getAllLeaveRecords()
  • addLeaveRecord(LeaveRecord, LeaveBalanceRecord)
  • getLeaveBalanceRecord(int)
  • getLeaveBalance_OfType(int, String)
  • getLeaveBalance_OfType(LeaveBalanceRecord, String)
  • updateLeaveBalance(LeaveBalanceRecord, String, int)
